Review Text: I am late in watching this show. Now, I can't wait to watch the next episode. I love the acting, the scenery the costumes and the in-depth story line. It is a mastery piece of work!
Review Title: Mastery
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa Extended Version
Review Date: 2014/10/10
Categories: Comedy, Feel-good, Outrageous, Fun
Product Description: ['Johnny Knoxville reprises his Jackass role as 86-year-old Irving Zisman in the story of a crotchety old man unexpectedly saddled with the care of his 8-year-old grandson Billy (Jackson Nicoll). Extended Version']
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jeff Tremaine'], 'Producers': ['Johnny Knoxville', 'Spike Jonze', 'Jeff Tremaine', 'Derek Freda', 'Trip Taylor'], 'Starring': ['Johnny Knoxville']}
Review Text: I would give it a minus 5 if there was a star for that. This is meant for the twenty something guy crowd. It was disgusting and embarrassing. The reviews said it was about a boy and his grandfather.  I never even got that far, it was so horrid.  I am too embarrassed to say how the movie even begins. My husband stared at me in disbelief. It is definitely not a family movie.  I guess I should have turned it off as soon as I saw "Jackass Presents..." I am in the dark, but not anymore.  Leave this for the guys and their immature minds.
Review Title: It was disgusting and embarrassing
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------

Review Text: What a sweet and loving movie.  Our daughter called us to say we had to watch this, that we would love it.  Indeed we did!
Review Title: PRECIOUS
Rating: 5.0

Review Text: We are still laughing after watching this delightful movie. It is so nice to see a movie that does not include intimate scenes or foul language. It is a wonderful family movie, filled with delight.  May you enjoy it as much as we did!
Review Title: Still Laughing
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Age Of Adaline
Review Date: 2016/11/03
Categories: Fantasy, Drama, Beautiful, Gentle
Product Description: ['Blake Lively and Harrison Ford star in this stirring romantic drama about a 29-year-old woman who has stopped aging - and the timeless power of love.']
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Lee Toland Krieger'], 'Producers': ['Sidney Kimmel', 'Tom Rosenberg', 'Gary Lucchesi'], 'Starring': ['Blake Lively', 'Michiel Huisman']}
Review Text: This is the best movie we have seen a a long, long time. It was beautifully done. There was so much emotion in it, shared through the screen, giving us the same sorrows, laughter, tears and joy. We are still talking about it, days later!
Review Title: Long, long time
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2016/12/25
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English', 'English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Robert Zemeckis'], 'Producers': ['Steve Starkey', 'Robert Zemeckis', 'Gary Goetzman', 'William Teitler'], 'Starring': ['Tom Hanks', 'Michael Jeter', 'Nona Gaye'], 'Studio': ['WARNER HOME VIDEO']}
Review Text: As a Christmas Eve tradition, we watch The Polar Express. Though our family has watched it yearly  since it first came out, we never tire of it, all of our emotions as if we were watching it for the first time. It is an excellent movie. Tom Hanks is extraordinary as the conductor, and the children are marvelous in their parts. The artistry and creativity of this film is magnificent. Place it in your video library, beside "It's A Wonderful Life" and "Miracle on 34th Street," movies that will please you and future viewers in all of the years to come.
Review Title: A Tradition
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Review Date: 2016/12/31
Average Rating: 4.7

Review Text: This has been a fun and exciting series to watch.  It is quite unpredictable, adding interest to the dialogue and actions.  The characters are terrific, chosen actors delightfully filling their parts well.  Go on a binge! You will not want to stop watching it!
Review Title: Binge Time
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Good Girls Revolt
Review Date: 2016/12/31
Categories: Drama
Product Description: ['In 1969, while a cultural revolution swept through the free world, there was still one place that refused to change with the times: newsrooms. Good Girls Revolt follows a group of young female researchers at "News of the Week," who ask to be treated fairly. Their revolutionary request sparks convulsive changes and upends marriages, careers, sex lives, love lives, and friendships.']
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: Low', 'English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'Español (España)', 'Italiano', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', '日本語', 'Deutsch', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Deutsch', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Français', 'Italiano', '日本語'], 'Directors': ['Scott Winant', 'Dan Attias', 'Gloria Muzio', 'Minkie Spiro', 'Daisy von Scherler Mayer', 'Roxann Dawson'], 'Producers': ['Dana Calvo', 'Darlene Hunt', 'Lynda Obst', 'Jeff Okin', 'Scott Winant', 'Don Kurt'], 'Starring': ['Genevieve Angelson', 'Anna Camp', 'Erin Darke']}
Review Text: Wow! What a terrific story. I learned so much about the period and times.  It also made me become aware why I, as a female for the college newspaper, never got a by-line. I needed these ladies to wake up my eyes to the horrid discrimination between genders. I knew about pay, but did not know how women did the work and the men got the glory. Please, please watch this.  Though it is a fictional in dialogue, the story behind it is part of our history and how women were not looked at as having intelligence in the field.  What a disgrace. Yes, yes, watch this!
Review Title: It's about time to recognize the issue!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Review Text: We stayed up late many a night, wanting to see what was going to happen next.  Billy Bob Thornton is outstanding! All of the cast is great; you forget you do not know the characters personally, actually watching them through their trauma and drama.  When with friends, we end up talking about this fantastic show, all of us loving the series , each of us having a favorite part. You must watch it! You will be glad you did!

Product Title: Good Girls Revolt
Review Date: 2016/12/31
Categories: Drama
Product Description: ['In 1969, while a cultural revolution swept through the free world, there was still one place that refused to change with the times: newsrooms. Good Girls Revolt follows a group of young female researchers at "News of the Week," who ask to be treated fairly. Their revolutionary request sparks convulsive changes and upends marriages, careers, sex lives, love lives, and friendships.']
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: Low', 'English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'Español (España)', 'Italiano', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', '日本語', 'Deutsch', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Deutsch', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Français', 'Italiano', '日本語'], 'Directors': ['Scott Winant', 'Dan Attias', 'Gloria Muzio', 'Minkie Spiro', 'Daisy von Scherler Mayer', 'Roxann Dawson'], 'Producers': ['Dana Calvo', 'Darlene Hunt', 'Lynda Obst', 'Jeff Okin', 'Scott Winant', 'Don Kurt'], 'Starring': ['Genevieve Angelson', 'Anna Camp', 'Erin Darke']}
Review Text: Wow! What a terrific story. I learned so much about the period and times.  It also made me become aware why I, as a female for the college newspaper, never got a by-line. I needed these ladies to wake up my eyes to the horrid discrimination between genders. I knew about pay, but did not know how women did the work and the men got the glory. Please, please watch this.  Though it is a fictional in dialogue, the story behind it is part of our history and how women were not looked at as having intelligence in the field.  What a disgrace. Yes, yes, watch this!
Review Title: It's about time to recognize the issue!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Review Text: We stayed up late many a night, wanting to see what was going to happen next.  Billy Bob Thornton is outstanding! All of the cast is great; you forget you do not know the characters personally, actually watching them through their trauma and drama.  When with friends, we end up talking about this fantastic show, all of us loving the series , each of us having a favorite part. You must watch it! You will be glad you did!

raw_response:
**Shopping Preferences Summary:**

- **Strong Preference for Emotional and Heartwarming Content:** The individual frequently enjoys films with deep emotional narratives, showcasing themes of love, family, and personal growth.
- **High Ratings for Quality Storytelling and Production:** Consistently rates content highly when the storytelling, acting, and production values are perceived as excellent.
- **Family-Oriented Selections:** While they appreciate humor and feel-good content, they avoid titles with crude humor or inappropriate content, favoring family-friendly movies.
- **Interest in Gender Issues and Historical Context:** Shows heightened interest in productions that explore social themes, particularly related to women's rights and societal changes.
- **Engagement with Series and Binge-Watching:** Displays a tendency to binge-watch series that have engaging plots and strong character development, often discussing them with peers.
- **Consistent Participation in Annual Traditions:** Celebrates traditions like watching specific holiday films, indicating a preference for nostalgic or classic content.
- **Sensitive to Content Advisory Labels:** Avoids films with heavy violence and inappropriate subjects, indicating a desire for more wholesome entertainment experiences. 

Overall, this buyer seeks out high-quality, emotionally engaging films that align with family values and thought-provoking themes.

target_interaction.title: Unpredicatable
target_interaction.text: We continue to enjoy this show. It is well done, true to the core. The characters fit their parts quite well. You never know what is going to be said or happen next, most unpredictable.  Hope there will be a Season 2.
